section.name: Short howto
section.p: The ISO SQL standard declares that the Java stored procedure must be a public static mehtod. Of course, also the class must be public.

You can use a simple JDBC connection to access teh database the stored procedure is runing on, simply by calling DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:default:connection"). SQL portablity is always an issue, sorry we dont solve that.
